rules_text:
Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses 1 life.
At the beginning of each end step, if two or more creatures died this turn, transform Norman Osborn.
rules_text2:
Flying
When this creature transforms into Green Goblin, create two Bomb tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
Whenever you sacrifice a nonland permanent, each opponent loses 2 life.
